data.title: The Secretary (1995)
data.meta_description: After being passed over for a promotion, secretary Deidre turns to murder and blackmail.
data.text:
The Secretary – not to be confused with much more high-profile BDSM romance Secretary (2002) – is one of a series of psycho-thrillers made by Canadian producer Pierre David. Others include the generally routine to not-too-bad likes of The Paperboy, Stalked, Daddy’s Girl, Man of Her Dreams/The Fiancée, Cupid, The Nurse, The Perfect Nanny, The Perfect Tenant, The Stepdaughter, the surprisingly good The Landlady, the excellent Alone with a Stranger and a good many others.

As with most of Pierre David’s psycho-thrillers, The Secretary blandly and formulaically copies other models. The Secretary feels exactly like it has been made to copy the previous year’s psycho secretary effort The Temp. And, although The Secretary is a better film than The Temp,…
